SYSTEM.system_blacklist_attempt: El id baneado {userid} trato de hacerse amigo.

help_message:
I am lobobot, Dota 2 Sud American League's Bot
The commands you can use are:
.inq / inqueue: Shows the people in queue for a game.
.sign / .q: Gets you into the queue.
.leave: Gets you out of the queue.
.me: Shows how much points you have.
.reg steamID: registers you into the Sudamerican Dota 2 League.
.top: Shows the TOP 10 of the league
.check nick: Shows you someone else points in the league.
.games: Shows the games that are being played.
.challenge opponentnick: Challenges someone.
.accept: Accepts a challenge made by someone else to you.
.pool / .join : Adds you to the challenge's pool of players or shows you the pool of players if you are a captain.
.pick nick: Chooses someone of the pool for playing in your team.
.cancel: Cancels a challenge in progress. It can be use by the captains or an admin.

CMD_HELP.lfg: Avisarle a mis amigos que quiero jugar.
CMD_HELP.inhouse: Avisarle a mis amigos que quiero jugar un cerrado, se debe agregar una password al comando.
CMD_HELP.whois: Busca un usuario por su ID.

LFG_RESPONSES.lfg_response_sender: Le avise a todos que queres jugar.

INHOUSE_RESPONSES.inhouse_response_sender: Le avise a todos que queres jugar un cerrado.

mute_response: No te van a llegar mas avisos.
unmute_response: Te van a volver a llegar avisos.

ADMIN.lookup_error: No hay amigo con ese ID.
